thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lepu Medical Technology To Invest In Investment Fund, Waterstone Pharmaceuticals Inc

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lepu Medical Technology To Invest In Investment Fund, Waterstone Pharmaceuticals Inc

organizations.name: lepu medical technology beijing co ltd

text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Lepu Medical Technology Beijing Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO INVEST 187.5 MILLION YUAN ($29.65 million) IN FUJIAN INVESTMENT FUND
* SAYS UNIT PLANS TO ACQUIRE 25 PERCENT STAKE IN WATERSTONE PHARMACEUTICALS INC FOR $14 MILLION Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EYuiQZ ; bit.ly/2ovRQT3 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3232 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
